entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
